title: S1 Ep3: S1, The State v. Adnan Syed - Episode 2 - Hae's Day
itunes:title: S1, The State v. Adnan Syed - Episode 2 - Hae's Day
description:
April 27, 2015 / The team examines what we know about what Hae Min Lee was doing on the day of her disappearance, and what Serial got wrong.

Additional music by "Konichiwa" by Chequerboard - http://www.chequerboard.com / http://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music / Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) / Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 - http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
